amendment.description: To redirect certain foreign assistance to the Government of Egypt as a result of the July 3, 2013, military coup d'etat.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1739 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 13. Record Vote Number: 195.
Amendment SA 1739 proposed by Senator Paul.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1739 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 13. Record Vote Number: 195.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1739 proposed by Senator Paul.
